Literature.Title: Can we predict biological activity of antimicrobial peptides from their interactions with model phospholipid membranes?
Literature.Author: Papo N, Shai Y

Literature.Title: The consequence of sequence alteration of an amphipathic alpha-helical antimicrobial peptide and its diastereomers.
Literature.Author: Papo N, Oren Z, Pag U, Sahl HG, Shai Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=3µM),Escherichia coli D21(MIC=3µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis LT1324(MIC=1.5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=6µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=2µM),Micrococcus luteus(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus simulans(MIC=1.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus II ATCC 6538P(MIC=6µM)
